tests.instruction: Navigate to settings page by pressing settings button on the navigation bar. Click change username, type in a new random username and input the wrong password.
tests.expected: An alert pops up notifying the user that the password is wrong. Username is not changed.

tests.instruction: Navigate to settings page by pressing settings button on the navigation bar. Click change username, type in a username that is already in existence, and input any password (wrong or correct).
tests.expected: An alert pops up notifying the user that the username is already taken. Username is not changed.

tests.instruction: Navigate to settings page by pressing settings button on the navigation bar. Click change username, type in a new username and input the correct password.
tests.expected: The username is changed successfully. The profile page reflects the new username, and logging in also requires the new username.

tests.instruction: Navigate to settings page by pressing settings button on the navigation bar. Click change password, type in a wrong old password, and input the same new password and confirm new password.
tests.expected: An alert pops up notifying that the authentication fails. Password is not changed.

tests.instruction: Navigate to settings page by pressing settings button on the navigation bar. Click change password, type in the correct old password, and input the same new password and confirm password.
tests.expected: Password is changed. Logging in to the same account now requires the same password.

tests.instruction: Navigate to settings page by pressing settings button on the navigation bar. Click log out.
tests.expected: The user is logged out and redirected to the login page. Try accessing a page that requires logging in will redirects the user to the log in page.

tests.instruction: Navigate to settings page by pressing settings button on the navigation bar. Click on edit profile.
tests.expected: The user is redirected to the profile setup (edit) page.

tests.instruction: Navigate to settings page by pressing settings button on the navigation bar. Click on change name, input a wrong password and optionally a new name.
tests.expected: Notification that authentication fails, and name is not changed.

tests.instruction: Navigate to settings page by pressing settings button on the navigation bar. Click on change name, input the correct current password, and input a new name.
tests.expected: Notification that name is changed. Navigate to your profile page to verify.
